job_details.Functieomschrijving:
Are you looking for a place to graduate where you can gain hands-on experience in deploying, scaling, and maintaining AI-driven solutions? Do you want to bridge the gap between machine learning and production systems? Then join our team as an ML Engineering intern!, We are looking for an intern to strengthen our team in one of two exciting graduation projects. You'll work on innovative AI solutions, focusing on automation, deployment, and optimization of machine learning systems. Your research and implementation will contribute directly to real-world applications, working closely with our AI engineers in a dynamic environment of start- and scaleups.

   Your responsibilities:
     * Design, develop, and optimize AI pipelines for scalable deployment.

     * Research best practices for monitoring, versioning, and automating AI workflows.

     * Implement solutions that enhance the efficiency and reliability of AI models in production.

     * Collaborate with a small team to bring innovative AI solutions to life.

   Your graduation project options:
    1. Oddit: We are currently developing an LLM-based application called Oddit that is able to create AI roadmaps and strategies based on inputs such as interviews, data quality scans and code reviews. Basically, we automate our own workflow. Within this project there are plenty GenAI research angles, that will have direct impact on our product (Oddit).
    2. Your AI Engineering Pitch: Bring your own AI engineering topic related to our focus industries ClimateTech, Marketplaces, or Mobility. Whether it's optimizing an AI model performance in Energy, improving real-time data pipelines in a geospatial setting, or enhancing the AI system scalability for a large platform, we encourage you to pitch an AI idea that aligns with our focus industry., We look for people that want to enjoy the ride of a start-up and benefit from the freedom in the role:
     * A team of talented and ambitious ML engineers.
     * Insights into real-world AI challenges and deployment strategies.
     * The possibility of a full-time position as AI engineer at Enjins after your internship.
job_details.full_text:
Machine Learning Engineer - Internship

Are you looking for a place to graduate where you can gain hands-on experience in deploying, scaling, and maintaining AI-driven solutions? Do you want to bridge the gap between machine learning and production systems? Then join our team as an ML Engineering intern!, We are looking for an intern to strengthen our team in one of two exciting graduation projects. You'll work on innovative AI solutions, focusing on automation, deployment, and optimization of machine learning systems. Your research and implementation will contribute directly to real-world applications, working closely with our AI engineers in a dynamic environment of start- and scaleups.

   Your responsibilities:
     * Design, develop, and optimize AI pipelines for scalable deployment.

     * Research best practices for monitoring, versioning, and automating AI workflows.

     * Implement solutions that enhance the efficiency and reliability of AI models in production.

     * Collaborate with a small team to bring innovative AI solutions to life.

   Your graduation project options:
    1. Oddit: We are currently developing an LLM-based application called Oddit that is able to create AI roadmaps and strategies based on inputs such as interviews, data quality scans and code reviews. Basically, we automate our own workflow. Within this project there are plenty GenAI research angles, that will have direct impact on our product (Oddit).
    2. Your AI Engineering Pitch: Bring your own AI engineering topic related to our focus industries ClimateTech, Marketplaces, or Mobility. Whether it's optimizing an AI model performance in Energy, improving real-time data pipelines in a geospatial setting, or enhancing the AI system scalability for a large platform, we encourage you to pitch an AI idea that aligns with our focus industry., We look for people that want to enjoy the ride of a start-up and benefit from the freedom in the role:
     * A team of talented and ambitious ML engineers.
     * Insights into real-world AI challenges and deployment strategies.
     * The possibility of a full-time position as AI engineer at Enjins after your internship.

profile_classification.rationale: The job description emphasizes deploying, scaling, and maintaining AI-driven solutions, bridging machine learning and production systems. Key responsibilities include designing and optimizing AI pipelines, researching monitoring and automation, and implementing solutions for AI models in production, aligning strongly with ML Engineer core responsibilities and MLOps.

job_tasks.task: Design, develop, and optimize AI pipelines for scalable deployment.
job_tasks.justification: This phrase directly relates to building and managing the infrastructure and pipelines for deploying and scaling AI models in production.

job_tasks.task: Research best practices for monitoring, versioning, and automating AI workflows.
job_tasks.justification: Monitoring, versioning, and automation are core components of MLOps, focusing on the operational aspects of AI systems.

job_tasks.task: Implement solutions that enhance the efficiency and reliability of AI models in production.
job_tasks.justification: This task focuses on the practical implementation of improvements for AI models already in a production environment, which is a key MLOps concern.

job_tasks.task: Collaborate with a small team to bring innovative AI solutions to life.
job_tasks.justification: This highlights the need for teamwork and working with others to achieve project goals.

job_tasks.task: gain hands-on experience in deploying, scaling, and maintaining AI-driven solutions
job_tasks.justification: This directly describes the core activities of MLOps: deploying, scaling, and maintaining AI systems.

job_tasks.task: bridge the gap between machine learning and production systems
job_tasks.justification: This phrase explicitly states the role's function in connecting ML models to production environments, a central tenet of MLOps.

job_tasks.task: focusing on automation, deployment, and optimization of machine learning systems
job_tasks.justification: Automation, deployment, and optimization are key aspects of managing and improving ML systems in production.

job_tasks.task: Your research and implementation will contribute directly to real-world applications
job_tasks.justification: While broad, contributing to real-world applications implies building and integrating solutions that have a tangible impact, often involving software development.

job_tasks.task: creating AI roadmaps and strategies based on inputs such as interviews, data quality scans and code reviews.
job_tasks.justification: This involves understanding business needs (roadmaps, strategies) and technical inputs (data quality, code reviews) to inform AI solutions.
This indicates a focus on improving business processes through AI, requiring an understanding of the existing workflow and its business context.

job_tasks.task: optimizing an AI model performance in Energy, improving real-time data pipelines in a geospatial setting, or enhancing the AI system scalability for a large platform
job_tasks.justification: Optimizing model performance and enhancing system scalability are directly related to the core ML modeling process and its practical application.
This phrase directly refers to the design, building, and maintenance of data pipelines.

soft_skills.skill: enjoy the ride of a start-up and benefit from the freedom in the role
Insights into real-world AI challenges and deployment strategies
